sentence: CNN North Carolina elections board says it has power to disqualify Rep. Cawthorn from running over January 6 The North Carolina State Board of Elections said on Monday that it has the power to block GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn from running for reelection over his role in the January 6 insurrection -- an open legal question at the center of liberal-backed efforts to disqualify him from future office.
title: Overnight News Digest: Europe's giant

sentence: Photos obtained by POLITICO By Michael Kruse 04/22/2022 04:47 PM EDT Updated: 04/22/2022 06:00 PM EDT Photographs obtained by POLITICO appear to show Madison Cawthorn, the embattled Republican congressman from North Carolina who recently accused his GOP colleagues of inviting him to orgies, wearing lingerie in what appears to be a party setting.
title: Exclusive: Madison Cawthorn photos reveal him wearing women's lingerie in public setting

sentence: Republican Reps. Matt Gaetz of Florida, Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, and Paul Gosar of Arizona have all proxy voted over 100 times.
author: Bryan Metzger
title: These 15 Republicans have proxy voted at least 100 times even though Kevin McCarthy and GOP leadership think voting remotely is unconstitutional

sentence: Thom Tillis called Wednesday for the House Ethics Committee to investigate fellow North Carolina Republican Rep. Madison Cawthorn after watchdog agencies told the Washington Examiner the congressman could be implicated in an insider trading scheme,? reports Anna Kaplan: Tillis said in a tweet insider trading by a member of Congress is a serious betrayal of their oath,? adding that Cawthorn owes North Carolinians an explanation.? The Examiner reports Cawthorn was pictured at an event on December 29 with James Koutoulas, one of the people behind the Let's Go Brandon? cryptocurrency, which is named after the viral chant insulting President Joe Biden.
author: Zach Everson
title: Checks & Imbalances: McCarthy's Money, Cawthorn's Crypto, Truth Social's Triumph

sentence: CALL TO ACTIVISM (@CalltoActivism) May 6, 2022 Nude video actually turning some Rs against Cawthorne David Morgan Reuters WASHINGTON, May 5 (Reuters) - A grainy 28-second video showing a naked young man gyrating against someone in bed amid squeals and laughter was the latest in a string of episodes that has turned Republicans against one of their own: the brash U.S. Representative Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina.
title: Good News Roundup for Friday, May 6, 2022: Don't Agonize, Organize!
